text: @realDonaldTrump Yet another lie from a piece of shit who can’t keep Obama’s name out of his mouth. You stoop to a lower level everyday and you have people fooled about how you love America so much. The blood of our troops and the blood of COVID-19 victims are on your hands #WorstPresidentEver
